company_legal_names: ozturk container industry and trade limited
locations: tr, turkey, marmara region, sultanbeyli, 34935, demokrasi caddesi, , 40.97261185713156, 29.255931868812933 | tr, turkey, marmara region, ataşehir, 34888, seyitnizam caddesi, , 40.984746448772334, 29.18836839934469
short_description: ozturk container is a metal storage tanks supplier based in sultanbeyli, turkey.
long_description: öztürk container industry and trade limited company has been manufacturing demountable living containers, office containers, prefabricated buildings, iso containers, steel structure buildings, military containers, containers used in the oil and gas industry, special shelters, generator containers, water treatment containers and gsm since 1984. öztürk is one of the world's most experienced and advanced manufacturers in the production of containers. providing the highest quality products and services under tse and iso 9001:2008 quality assurance certifications. ozturk container is established in istanbul/turkey since 1984 and manufactures many types of containers for the mining , construction , military , oil&gas projects & etc. we have a total of 40.500 m2 area for our productions with 500 units per month capacity. some of our productions are: flatpack camp containers , iso containers , prefabricated steel buildings , gsm shelters , skid mounted containers , coldroom containers and custom built military containers.

generated_description: ozturk container, legally known as ozturk container industry and trade limited, is a company specializing in the manufacturing of various types of containers. the company produces iso containers, demountable (flatpack) containers, standard workplace containers, military containers, and custom-designed containers. ozturk container serves sectors including oil and gas, mining, military and defense, construction, manufacturing, humanitarian aid, and renewable energy. the company is known for its high-quality, custom-built solutions and offers services such as container rental, technical support, and assembly implementation. ozturk container operates from a 40,500 square meter production facility and serves over 20,000 customers globally, maintaining international certifications and a commitment to occupational health and safety.
